Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: Uyo anounza chakanaka (Islaam), achawana chiri nani kupfuura hukoshi hwacho; uye vachange vakachengetedzeka kubva kukutya kwezuva iroro
Uye uyo anounza chakaipa (kusatenda nezvitadzo), vachakandwa nezviso zvavo mumoto. (Zvichanzi kwavari): “Muri kupuhwa chimwe chinhu here kunze kweizvo maiita?”
Ndakarairwa (ini Muhammad (SAW)) kuti ndinamate Tenzi veguta rino (Makkah), avo vakariyeresa uye ndivo muridzi wezvose. Uye ndakarairwa kuti ndive pakati pemaMuslim (vanozvipira kuna Allah)
Uye kuti ndiverenge Qur’aan. Saka uyo anenge agamuchira gwara, anogamuchira munezvakanaka pachake; uye uyo anorasika, iva unoti (kwaari): “Ndingori mumwe wevayambiri.”

Uye iva unoti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Kurumbidzwa kwose nekutendwa ndekwa Allah; vachakuratidzai micherechedzo yavo (panyika kana zvirango), uye muchaiziva. Uye Tenzi vako hapana chavasingazivi kubva kune zvamunoita.”
Twaa – Seen – Meem. (Aya ndemamwe emavara ezvishamiso zveQur’aan, uye hapana umwe anoziva zvaanoreva kunze kwaAllah)
Idzi ndidzo ndima dzemuGwaro rakajeka (rinojekesa chokwadi kubva kumanyepo)
Tinokuverengera dzimwe dzenhaurwa dzaMusa naFarawo muchokwadi, kune vanhu vanotenda (muQur’aan iri uye nemuhumwechete hwaAllah)

Zvirokwazvo, Farawo akazvitutumadza munyika uye akaita vanhu vemo zvikwata, achidzvinyirira rimwe bato (vana vaIzirairi) pakati pavo, achiuraya vanakomana vavo, uye achisiya vakadzi vavo vararame. Zvirokwazvo, aive umwe wevatadzi vakuru
Uye takada kuvapa makomborero avo vaidzvinyirirwa munyika, uye kuti tivaite vatongi uye vagari venhaka
